verbs.description: embroider (third-person singular simple present embroiders, present participle embroidering, simple past and past participle embroidered)

entries.meaning: To stitch a decorative design on fabric with needle and thread of various colours.
(figuratively) To add imaginary detail to a narrative to make it more interesting or acceptable.
